name: Raging Oni King
description:
The character to which this is attached has their Normal Attacks deal +2 DMG, and their Physical DMG dealt converted to Geo DMG.
Duration (Rounds): 2
After the character to which this is attached uses a Normal Attack: Gains Superlative Superstrength. (Once per Round)
